showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I was really impressed with the campground: I had a site that had electric, water and sewer. They have very good washers and dryers. Very good  shower and toilet facilities, and very friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and each has a fire ring, picnic table and a trash bag hang.  We were in A near the bath house which was nice and modern - individual rooms with toilet/shower and sink.  Laundry room on end and I think it was $1.50 for wash and dry. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ bundle) and ice ($4.00? ) to purchase. Bathroom/ shower facilities are in need of serious updating but doable. ( this is the only reason I didn't give this campground 5 stars ). Tons of walking and biking trails right from the campground, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ park! We hammock camped and had two picnic tables, a grill and a fire pit at our site. There was a nice shower room/bathroom close to us. The workers here are friendly and helpful and the lakes and waterfall are beautiful.  When I ‚Ä¶

Stayed in section B with our camper. The restrooms are new in super clean you get a private toilet and shower room and there's three washers and three dryers and a air conditioned room very clean beautiful Park.

‚Ä¶ Wasn't expecting much as we were just passing thru on the way to the beach. Was extremely surprised with the campground and the bathrooms. Very clean restrooms and showers. Shower and toilet in the same room, but individual from the others.
A great State Park with lots of amenities: camping, archery, horseback riding, hiking, and more. Good clean bathrooms with hot water, and every one of them has a shower!
Beautiful Park. We only had time to drive around but we were about to check out the camp ground. It was nice with climate controlled individual (Family) bathrooms with a shower and changing table.
Ok place. Nice wooded area. Very small playground for kids. We'll enough to use bathrooms and shower, outdated. Cool trails. Full hookups. Dogs are allowed. Fire pits are at each site.
Wonderful early spring camping!  All new camping facilities including a new dog park. Fantastic playground for the kids.  Level sites. Private restroom/shower rooms. Well done!

showerReviews.reviewText: Not too bad ‚Ä¶ It seems to be an older Campground . But, It‚Äôs very quiet. Roadways are somewhat rough in spots. Shower house and laundry is a little dated also. But very reasonably priced.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ while you workout.  There are not free weights,  though I'd love to see those in the future.  The bathrooms are clean, there are no showers or lockers. Love to see them add a shower in the future.  The center offers various ‚Ä¶
Had alot of options going on from basketball on a inside court to folks renting out a space for  a baby shower event. Good options for the local community.
